001
002package com.commercetools.api.predicates.query.common;
003
004import java.util.function.Function;
005
006import com.commercetools.api.predicates.query.*;
007
008public class PriceDraftQueryBuilderDsl {
009    public PriceDraftQueryBuilderDsl() {
010    }
011
012    public static PriceDraftQueryBuilderDsl of() {
013        return new PriceDraftQueryBuilderDsl();
014    }
015
016    public StringComparisonPredicateBuilder<PriceDraftQueryBuilderDsl> key() {
017        return new StringComparisonPredicateBuilder<>(BinaryQueryPredicate.of().left(new ConstantQueryPredicate("key")),
018            p -> new CombinationQueryPredicate<>(p, PriceDraftQueryBuilderDsl::of));
019    }
020
021    public CombinationQueryPredicate<PriceDraftQueryBuilderDsl> value(
022            Function<com.commercetools.api.predicates.query.common.MoneyQueryBuilderDsl, CombinationQueryPredicate<com.commercetools.api.predicates.query.common.MoneyQueryBuilderDsl>> fn) {
023        return new CombinationQueryPredicate<>(
024            ContainerQueryPredicate.of()
025                    .parent(ConstantQueryPredicate.of().constant("value"))
026                    .inner(fn.apply(com.commercetools.api.predicates.query.common.MoneyQueryBuilderDsl.of())),
027            PriceDraftQueryBuilderDsl::of);
028    }
029
030    public StringComparisonPredicateBuilder<PriceDraftQueryBuilderDsl> country() {
031        return new StringComparisonPredicateBuilder<>(
032            BinaryQueryPredicate.of().left(new ConstantQueryPredicate("country")),
033            p -> new CombinationQueryPredicate<>(p, PriceDraftQueryBuilderDsl::of));
034    }
035
036    public CombinationQueryPredicate<PriceDraftQueryBuilderDsl> customerGroup(
037            Function<com.commercetools.api.predicates.query.customer_group.CustomerGroupResourceIdentifierQueryBuilderDsl, CombinationQueryPredicate<com.commercetools.api.predicates.query.customer_group.CustomerGroupResourceIdentifierQueryBuilderDsl>> fn) {
038        return new CombinationQueryPredicate<>(ContainerQueryPredicate.of()
039                .parent(ConstantQueryPredicate.of().constant("customerGroup"))
040                .inner(fn.apply(
041                    com.commercetools.api.predicates.query.customer_group.CustomerGroupResourceIdentifierQueryBuilderDsl
042                            .of())),
043            PriceDraftQueryBuilderDsl::of);
044    }
045
046    public CombinationQueryPredicate<PriceDraftQueryBuilderDsl> channel(
047            Function<com.commercetools.api.predicates.query.channel.ChannelResourceIdentifierQueryBuilderDsl, CombinationQueryPredicate<com.commercetools.api.predicates.query.channel.ChannelResourceIdentifierQueryBuilderDsl>> fn) {
048        return new CombinationQueryPredicate<>(
049            ContainerQueryPredicate.of()
050                    .parent(ConstantQueryPredicate.of().constant("channel"))
051                    .inner(fn.apply(
052                        com.commercetools.api.predicates.query.channel.ChannelResourceIdentifierQueryBuilderDsl.of())),
053            PriceDraftQueryBuilderDsl::of);
054    }
055
056    public DateTimeComparisonPredicateBuilder<PriceDraftQueryBuilderDsl> validFrom() {
057        return new DateTimeComparisonPredicateBuilder<>(
058            BinaryQueryPredicate.of().left(new ConstantQueryPredicate("validFrom")),
059            p -> new CombinationQueryPredicate<>(p, PriceDraftQueryBuilderDsl::of));
060    }
061
062    public DateTimeComparisonPredicateBuilder<PriceDraftQueryBuilderDsl> validUntil() {
063        return new DateTimeComparisonPredicateBuilder<>(
064            BinaryQueryPredicate.of().left(new ConstantQueryPredicate("validUntil")),
065            p -> new CombinationQueryPredicate<>(p, PriceDraftQueryBuilderDsl::of));
066    }
067
068    public CombinationQueryPredicate<PriceDraftQueryBuilderDsl> discounted(
069            Function<com.commercetools.api.predicates.query.common.DiscountedPriceDraftQueryBuilderDsl, CombinationQueryPredicate<com.commercetools.api.predicates.query.common.DiscountedPriceDraftQueryBuilderDsl>> fn) {
070        return new CombinationQueryPredicate<>(
071            ContainerQueryPredicate.of()
072                    .parent(ConstantQueryPredicate.of().constant("discounted"))
073                    .inner(fn.apply(
074                        com.commercetools.api.predicates.query.common.DiscountedPriceDraftQueryBuilderDsl.of())),
075            PriceDraftQueryBuilderDsl::of);
076    }
077
078    public CombinationQueryPredicate<PriceDraftQueryBuilderDsl> tiers(
079            Function<com.commercetools.api.predicates.query.common.PriceTierDraftQueryBuilderDsl, CombinationQueryPredicate<com.commercetools.api.predicates.query.common.PriceTierDraftQueryBuilderDsl>> fn) {
080        return new CombinationQueryPredicate<>(
081            ContainerQueryPredicate.of()
082                    .parent(ConstantQueryPredicate.of().constant("tiers"))
083                    .inner(fn.apply(com.commercetools.api.predicates.query.common.PriceTierDraftQueryBuilderDsl.of())),

086
087    public CollectionPredicateBuilder<PriceDraftQueryBuilderDsl> tiers() {
088        return new CollectionPredicateBuilder<>(BinaryQueryPredicate.of().left(new ConstantQueryPredicate("tiers")),
089            p -> new CombinationQueryPredicate<>(p, PriceDraftQueryBuilderDsl::of));
090    }
091
092    public CombinationQueryPredicate<PriceDraftQueryBuilderDsl> custom(
093            Function<com.commercetools.api.predicates.query.type.CustomFieldsDraftQueryBuilderDsl, CombinationQueryPredicate<com.commercetools.api.predicates.query.type.CustomFieldsDraftQueryBuilderDsl>> fn) {
